title: The Best Music of 2025: Surprises and Favorites
summary: In 2025, music critics picked their favorite albums and songs. They looked at lists from many music magazines to find the top music. Big stars like Taylor Swift did not get many votes. Instead, new artists like Addison Rae and older ones like Lily Allen were chosen. Addison Rae made a pop album with songs about wanting things like fame and peace. Lily Allen sang about a broken marriage in her songs. The critics liked music that was different and exciting, not just popular. This guide helps us learn about the best music of the year.

background_read: Music critics are people who listen to songs and albums and decide which ones are the best. Every year, they make lists of their favorites. In 2025, they combined many lists to find the top music. This helps people discover new and exciting songs that might not be the most popular but are loved by experts. Learning about these picks can help you explore different kinds of music and understand what makes a song special.
